ComicInfo.Summary:
A NEW ERA FOR MAGIC CONTINUES HERE!
With their homes rocked by an attack -- and Jace Beleren's life hanging in the balance -- Planeswalkers Kaya, Ral and Vraska must discover who is behind it all.
But as they begin to suspect one of Ravnica's biggest Guilds is behind the attack, it becomes clear their enemy may be plotting something even more destructive...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Matteo Scalera (a) & Moreno DiNisio (c) | 1 | B | Hidden Planeswalker Variant Cover (Virgin) | Daniel Warren Johnson (a) & Mike Spicer (c) | 2 | C | Hidden Planeswalker Variant Cover (Virgin) | Michael Walsh | 3 | D | Hidden Planeswalker Variant Cover (Virgin) | Jahnoy Lindsay | 4 | E | Blank Sketch Variant Cover (Green) | None | 5 | F | 1:10 Character Design Variant Cover | Ig Guara (a) & Tamra Bonvillain (c) | 6 | G | 1:25 Variant Cover | Kael Ngu | 7 | H | 1:50 Variant Cover (Virgin) | Kael Ngu | 8 | I | 1:100 Variant Cover (Virgin) | In-Hyuk Lee | 9 | J | Unlockable Variant Cover (Black & White) | Matteo Scalera | 10 |
